title: stitch
description: An intent log for agents and humans. Records the "why" behind code changes, linking intent documents to git commits and forming a semantic DAG on top of git history.

title: hone
description: A CLI integration test runner for command-line applications. Write tests in a simple DSL that executes real shell commands and asserts on output, exit codes, and files.

title: grove
description: A CLI tool for working with Git worktrees. Initialize bare clones, create and navigate worktrees, sync with origin, and prune merged branches.

title: nuggy
description: A command-line tool for exploring NuGet package metadata, viewing package contents, and managing feed sources.

title: burrow
description: A directory-scoped secrets manager. Secrets are stored outside your repos in a local SQLite store with inheritance from parent directories.

title: installer
description: A GitHub release installer service. Generates shell and PowerShell scripts to download and install binaries from GitHub releases.

title: relnotify
description: A Rust library for checking GitHub Releases to notify CLI users of available updates, with built-in caching and disk persistence.

title: gh-release-update-notifier
description: A TypeScript library for checking GitHub Releases to notify CLI users of available updates, with built-in caching and disk persistence.
